title: ICE -Zpolymorphize=on "collection encountered polymorphic constant: Unevaluated(UnevaluatedConst"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `src/test/ui/issues/issue-39292.rs` ```Rust // run-pass // Regression test for issue #39292. The object vtable was being // incorrectly left with a null pointer. trait Foo { fn print<'a>(&'a self) where T: 'a { println!("foo"); } } impl<'a> Foo<&'a ()> for () { } trait Bar: for<'a> Foo<&'a ()> { } impl Bar for () {} fn main() { (&() as &dyn Bar).print(); // Segfault } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (32e613bba 2022-12-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 32e613bbaafee1bcabba48a2257b838f8d1c03d3 commit-date: 2022-12-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output `rustc src/test/ui/issues/issue-39292.rs -Zpolymorphize=on` ``` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:786:54: collection encountered polymorphic constant: Unevaluated(UnevaluatedConst { def: WithOptConstParam { did: DefId(0:5 ~ issue_39292[a2ad]::Foo::print), const_param_did: None }, substs: [(), T, ReErased], promoted: Some(promoted[1]) }, &[&str; 1]) --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-39292.rs:6:51 | 6 | fn print<'a>(&'a self) where T: 'a { println!("foo"); } | ^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/32e613bbaafee1bcabba48a2257b838f8d1c03d3/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:972:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ff11c464a5a -
